overview: Nicolas has a strong entrepreneurial experience since 1999 when he founded Everbee Networks, a specialist in network security processors. After contributing to the repositioning strategy of the company, Nicolas joined McKinsey in 2006. He later left McKinsey to create Pepita with Olivier Schott and Frederic Bocquet. As co-founder and CEO of Pepita, Nicolas drives the development strategy of the company and helps publishers and e-merchants maximizing their online revenues.
